name: Drunken way to Home
description:
This is the action adventure game where a drunkard is trying to go back his home.
Control and guide him toward his home!

FEATURE

Physical Simulation
Drunken movements are fully simulated with physical calculation.

Simple Control
Walking around with mouse only.

　　
　　・ Move forward : Left and Right mouse buttons
　　・ Turn around (L) : Left mouse button
　　・ Turn around (R) : Right mouse button

Customize
You can select playable character and costume.

Enjoy your drunkenness :)
